video.title: America Unearthed
video.synopsis: Forensic geologist Scott Wolter explores mysteries, artifacts and relics to reveal a history of the North American continent not taught in school.

episodes.synopsis: Scott hits the road to explore the secrets of a location protected by the government and its possible connection to the ancient Mayans.
episodes.title: American Maya Secrets

episodes.synopsis: In the mountains of Arizona, Scott looks into a mysterious burial site and explores how it could be connected to medieval Britain.
episodes.title: Medieval Desert Mystery

episodes.synopsis: Scott looks into the possibility that copper deposits near Lake Superior have a connection with Minoan culture during the Bronze Age.
episodes.title: Great Lakes Copper Heist

episodes.synopsis: Scott heads to Minnesota, where a farmer claims to have uncovered bones that might have belonged to a Viking giant.
episodes.title: Giants in Minnesota

episodes.synopsis: Scott examines carvings in a cave and a boulder pulled from a river that appear to have wide-ranging connections to an ancient Egyptian religion.
episodes.title: A Deadly Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: With help from a local man, Scott explores a site in New Hampshire with apparent ties both to Stonehenge in England and to the ancient Phoenicians.
episodes.title: Stonehenge in America

episodes.synopsis: Scott re-evaluates a series of clues that have largely been dismissed but that may yet reveal the fate of the legendary Lost Colony of Roanoke.
episodes.title: Mystery of Roanoke

episodes.synopsis: Scott ventures deep into the Pennsylvania woods to examine a stone structure that might have been a ritualistic chamber for a secret society.
episodes.title: Chamber Hunting

episodes.synopsis: Scott considers evidence that the suicide of American explorer Meriwether Lewis was in fact murder -- and its possible ties to Thomas Jefferson.
episodes.title: Motive for Murder

episodes.synopsis: Scott examines a collection of crosses and other artifacts found in Arizona that suggest a European presence in America centuries before Columbus.
episodes.title: The Desert Cross

episodes.synopsis: Scott considers the possibility that a peculiar symbol may be related to the Knights Templar -- and point the way to the Holy Grail.
episodes.title: Tracking the Templars

episodes.synopsis: Scott scrutinizes Rhode Island's Newport Tower to prove that it was built by the Knights Templar centuries ago.
episodes.title: America's Oldest Secret

episodes.synopsis: Accompanied by a devoted treasure hunter, Scott embarks on an epic quest to locate the Holy Grail on land belonging to an alleged Templar prince.
episodes.title: Hunt for the Holy Grail
